creator: junk_email@mac.com
text:
Ant <get> task creates zero-length destinations even if there is an invalid
connection.

The solution is to create the FileOutputStream (fos, line 192) *after* the
InputStream has been checked for null-ness.

In the new model, if the connection fails, a FileOutputStream is not created and
hence no zero-length file is created when the exception is thrown.
